sentences.en: As for composers, modernists like Bela Bartók were hieratic and formalist, and postmodernists, like John Adams, were playful and interested in deconstructing.
sentences.cn: 说到作曲家，现代主义者如贝拉•巴托克是僧侣似的、形式主义的，而后现代主义者如约翰•亚当斯则是顽皮的、精于解构的。

sentences.en: Of, relating to, or written in the simplified form of ancient egyptian hieratic writing.
sentences.cn: 古埃及)通俗文字的古埃及象形文字的简单书写体的, 或与之有关的, 或用之书写的.

sentences.en: The more hieratic sculptures leave the viewer curiously unmoved.
sentences.cn: 过于抽象的雕塑作品使观者感到不解和索然无味.
